other_tests.findings: Diffuse fibrosis involved 95% of the lung, with areas of honeycomb fibrosis and bronchiectasis. Histopathological examination showed extensive interstitial fibrosis, interstitial lymphocytic infiltrate, and vacuolated histiocytes.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Post-operative follow-up revealed resolution of pulmonary hypertension and patient improvement, returning to work with FVC at 60-65% of predicted value.

other_tests.findings: Impaired platelet function; primary aggregation response present, but full secondary aggregation absent.
Normal sinus rhythm with poor R-wave progression and nonspecific ST-segment and T-wave findings in leads V1 through V3.
Moderately echogenic liver texture consistent with fatty infiltration.
